idea-plugin.name: Keyboard Typing Sounds
idea-plugin.description:
Keyboard Typing Sounds

Enhance your IntelliJ experience by adding realistic keyboard typing sounds, similar to Opera GX.

Features

  • Custom typing sounds for keys
  • Separate sounds for Enter, Backspace, and other special keys
  • Event sounds for Run Complete and Run Fail
  • Adjustable volume and enable/disable sounds via Settings
  • Open Source - Feel free to contribute
